node.html:
Music Flights, June-July 2020 View

  • Created with React library and Redux for state management.

  • Built reusable components with Styled-Components.

  • Used Redux thunk for asynchronous actions, like bringing Data from Firestore to the App.

RorRecipes, May- June 2020 View

  • Designed overall reusable component structure of the application.

  • Implemented the frontend in React, Material UI and SASS.

  • Implemented REST API calls and updated the state throughout the application using Redux.

  • Sign-In workflow with Firebase.

Sappler IELTS, April 2020 View

  • Responsive app created using JavaScript, HTML & CSS.

  • Implemented the AJAX call that retrieves data from the OpenWeather API.

WeDevelopers, May 2020 View

  • Personal Website for a Cake Bakery, which allows customers to see all available products.

  • Build with JavaScript HTML5 & CSS3

  • Realized catalog page and designed the logic to allow the user to filter their searches.

  • Use of Fetch API to get the data.
